name: The 2nd World Conference on Architecture and Civil Engineering
content: We are delighted to invite you to the 2nd World Conference on Architecture and Civil Engineering, taking place from November 27 to 29, 2024, in Vienna, Austria. This prestigious conference aims to bring together leading academic scientists, researchers, and research scholars to exchange and share their experiences and research results on all aspects of Architecture and Civil Engineering. One of the key benefits of this conference is the excellent opportunity for networking and collaboration, allowing participants to connect with industry professionals and peers, fostering new relationships and potential partnerships. Additionally, the conference offers a blend of in-person and virtual sessions, ensuring flexibility and accessibility for all attendees. Beyond the academic experience, participants are encouraged to explore the cultural and historical wonders of Vienna, with a complimentary city tour included. Presenters also have the opportunity to publish their research, further enhancing the value of their participation. Please note the important dates: Paper Submission Deadline: 13 November 2024 Early Registration Deadline: 28 August 2024 Final Registration Deadline: 20 November 2024 We look forward to your participation in this enriching and inspiring event.
